alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 8:47PM CDT until August 10 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN ARTHUR...NORTHEASTERN KEITH AND SOUTHWESTERN MCPHERSON COUNTIES... At 846 PM CDT/746 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Keystone, or 15 miles south of Arthur, moving east- southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Keystone, Big Bald Hill, Nevens and Broganville. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 99 and 119. Highway 92 near mile marker 138. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
